```{r}
library("rvest")
library ("datasets")
library("ggplot2")



## 
Data <- read_html( "https://www.premierleague.com/matchweek/3285/table")


Presidents <- html_table(html_nodes(Data, "table")[[2]])
Presidents

x <- as.vector(Presidents$'Pts')
y <- as.vector(Presidents$'GD')


qplot (x, y, geom = c("point", "smooth"))
```
